body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel!
___

**Version Number:** 9.3.21-0
**Reproducible in staging?:** Yes
**Reproducible in production?:** Yes
**If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-5132/folder/13176964/41237739/1186706320
**Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** emady.syed1234+400@gmail.com
**Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team
**Bug source:** Regression TC Execution
**Device used:** Windows 11 / Chrome
**App Component:** Chat Report View

## Action Performed:
1. Open https://staging.new.expensify.com/home
2. Logout 
3. Click on https://staging.new.expensify.com/concierge
4. Enter Old User details and login 
5. Logout and repeat step 3-4 with new User

## Expected Result:
User should navigate to the concierge chat when clicking on its chat link

## Actual Result:
User does not navigate to concierge chat via link and land on home page instead

## Workaround:
Unknown

- [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome
- [ ] iOS: App
- [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.3.19-5 **Reproducible in staging?:** (Needs Reproduction) Transactions deleted when deleting card feed **Reproducible in production?:** 9Needs reproduction) **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** **Logs:** https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/4856 **Expensify/Expensify Issue URL:** **Issue reported by:** @abbagail **Slack conversation** (hyperlinked to channel name): [#Expensify Bugs](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM/p1771362776213759) ## Action Performed: 1. Go to Reports > Accounting > Unapproved Card, or Reports > Accounting > Reconciliation (and update to Expensify Card, groupby:card) 2. See expenses that fall into that range 3. Feed column shows: "Deleted Feed." ## Expected Result: See "Expensify Card" or even "Expensify Card:workspace" ## Actual Result: "Deleted Feed" (This implies from help sources and AZ that the feed/connection is deactivated or removed and will no longer update. this is not accurate for Active Expensify Cards.) ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos The video for the issue is in Slack [thread](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM/p1771362776213759) [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: Web - BaseVideoPlayer - Loader does not appear consistently during slow network

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel!
___

**Version Number:** 9.3.21-0
**Reproducible in staging?:** Yes
**Reproducible in production?:** Yes
**If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/82480
**Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+th12@applause.expensifail.com
**Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team
**Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution
**Device used:** Windows 11
**App Component:** Other

## Action Performed:
1. Open the New Expensify App on Web.
2. Go to the workspace chat.
3. Click on “+” → “Add attachment”.
4. Select a short video (<24MB).
5. Before sending or playing the video, activate “Simulate poor internet connection” (network throttling / slow network).
6. Send or open the video.
7. Observe the loader behavior (ActivityIndicator).

## Expected Result:
The loader (ActivityIndicator) should remain visible consistently while the video is loading or buffering under slow network conditions.

Once the video loads and starts playing, the loader disappears.

## Actual Result:
The loader appears briefly at the start of the video load.

When the connection fluctuates, the app shows “No Connection” and does not keep the loader visible.

The video eventually loads and plays normally only after exiting and re-entering, without the loader being displayed during intermittent loading.

## Workaround:
Unknown

## Platforms:
- [ ] Android: App
- [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome
- [ ] iOS: App
- [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari
- [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome
- [x] Windows: Chrome
- [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari

## Screenshots/Videos

## Action Performed:

1. Open https://staging.new.expensify.com
2. Navigate to the non default workspace settings > More Features
3. Enable the Travel feature toggle
4. Click on Travel
5. Click on Let's go

## Expected Result:
"Book travel" RHP with the message "You'll need to use your work email (e.g., name@company.com) with Expensify Travel, not your personal email (e.g., name@gmail.com)." should display

## Actual Result:
The "Book travel" RHP is briefly displayed and disappeared

Unknown

If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel!
___

**Version Number:** 9.3.21-0
**Reproducible in staging?:** Yes
**Reproducible in production?:** Yes
**If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/folder/13176674/test-cases/53829876
**Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** N/A
**Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team
**Bug source:** Exploratory - Significant User Experience Deterioration
**Device used:** MacBook Air 15.7.3 Chrome
**App Component:** Other

## Action Performed:
1. Sign in to ND
2. Create a workspace, enable Per diem and upload rates
3. Track a distance expense in the workspace chat
4. Add a per diem expense in the workspace chat
5. Click on "+" button in the bottom left corner and verify, that "Create per diem" is displayed under Quick action
6. Navigate to the Account - Troubleshoot, clear cache
7. Repeat step 5

## Expected Result:
"Create per diem" is shown in QAB after clearing cache

## Actual Result:
"Create per diem" not shown in QAB after clearing cache

## Workaround:
Unknown
